TopicTitle: I wonder does if i bought KSP in 2012 than transferred to steam does i get free dlc....

Articles.Content:
after final release?

When i bought KSP for 17$ back than (good old times:) ) among promises was that we get free dlc, i wonder does this is applicable for those who transferred their purchase to Steam?
Yes, although you should archive your original email receipt, just to be safe.
Steam users will get free updates just like everyone else.

Steam users will get free updates just like everyone else.

He talks about DLCs, not updates ...

people who bought KSP before the launch on Steam will receive any future KSP DLCs for free.

All others have to pay for them

Let's not get ahead of ourselves here. There has never been any real indication that paid DLC will ever happen. There was some speculation based on an offhand comment by Harvester once, but it was blown way out of proportion.

He talks about DLCs, not updates ...

people who bought KSP before the launch on Steam will receive any future KSP DLCs for free.

All others have to pay for them

That's not accurate. Players who bought before May 2013, whether through Steam or the KSP Store, are entitled to free DLC if any is produced. Source.

OP, if you transfer to Steam your license will remain the same, you will still get any DLC for free.
